programme.title: Golf: It's a Very Difficult Game
programme.short_synopsis: A special mixed-couples golf match heightens Alistair Cooke's passion for golf.
programme.medium_synopsis: An special mixed-couples golf match that paired Tiger Woods with Annika Sorenstam, and David Duval with Karrie Webb, inspires Alistair Cooke to reflect on his most beloved sport, golf.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
